casebody.data:
In the Matter of Harry M. ALBRIGHT, Bankrupt. Robert P. Shick, Appellant. No. 7775. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. Argued Oct. 10, 1941. Decided Oct 10, 1941. Rehearing Denied Oct. 30, 1941. Robert P. Shick, of Philadelphia, Pa., for appellant. John H. Bertolet, (of Stevens & Lee) of Reading, Pa., for appellee.

Before MARIS, JONES and GOODRICH, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The order of the district court is affirmed.
